entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
